org.apache.juneau.transform

Class AnnotationBeanTransform<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.transform.Transform
      • org.apache.juneau.transform.BeanTransform<T>
        • org.apache.juneau.transform.AnnotationBeanTransform<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class type that this transform applies to.

    public final class AnnotationBeanTransform<T>
extends BeanTransform<T>
    Bean transform constructed from a @Bean annotation found on a class.

    *** Internal class - Not intended for external use ***

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

        Constructor.

        annotatedClass - The class found to have a @Bean annotation.
